data.text: Alatala Sɛnbɛn Birin Kanna, Isirayilaa Ala ito nan falaxi lan Moyaba yamanan ma, a naxa,
Tantunna mi fa Moyaba yamanan xa,
Gbelegbele xuiin tema nɛn Xoronayin taani!
Moyaba yamanan kalama nɛn!
E tema wugɛ nɛn Luxiti geyaan ma.
Ɛ gi! Birin xa a niin makata!
Amasɔtɔ ɛ yigi saxi ɛ kɛwanle nun ɛ nafunle nin,
Halagi tiin soma nɛn ɛ taane birin yi,
Ɛ Moyaba mali
Dangan na kanna xa
“Moyaba yi bɔɲɛ xunbelixi
Koni, Alatalaa falan ni ito ra,
Moyaba yagima nɛn Kemosi suxurena fe ra,
Ɛ a falama di nayi, ɛ naxa,
Moyaba yamanan kalama nɛn,
Moyaba halagi waxatin bata a li,
Ɛ tan a rabilinna muxune,
“Ɛ tan Dibon kaane,
Aroyeri kaane,
Yagin nan a ra Moyaba xa,
“Kitin bata keli yamanan xili ma
e nun Dibon nun Nebo nun Beti-Dibilatayimi,
e nun Kiriyatayimi nun Beti-Gamulu nun Beti-Meyɔn,
e nun Kɛriyoti nun Bosara,
Moyaba sɛnbɛn bata kala,
“Ɛ Alaa xɔlɔn dɔlɔn so a yii,
Ɛ tan xa mi yi Isirayila yamanan magelema ba?
Ɛ tan Moyaba kaane,
“Nxu bata Moyaba kaane wasona fe mɛ
Alatalaa falan ni ito ra,
“Nanara, n Moyaba wugama,
N wugama Sibima manpa binle fe ra
Sɛwan nun ɲaxaɲaxan bata ɲan
Xɛsibɔn kaane gbelegbele xuiin sigama
N Moyaba yamanan naxɔrima nɛn,
“Nanara, n bɔɲɛn wugama Moyaba fe ra.
Bayo muxune birin bata e xunne bi,
Saya feen nan tun fa mɛma Moyaba banxine
Ee! E ɲaxankataxi!
Bayo Alatala ito nan falaxi, a naxa,
Kɛriyoti suxuma nɛn, a yire makantanxine yi tongo.
Moyaba kalama nɛn,
Ɛ tan Moyaba kaane,
“Naxan na a gi gbalon bun,
“Muxu gixine taganxin yigiyaan fenma nɛn Xɛsibɔn taani,
Gbalona ɛ tan Moyaba kaane xa!
Koni waxati famatɔni,
